name: Americlap
description:
The Patriotic Clapping Game

Keep clapping at your microphone as hard as you can to keep the American flag flying high, should you stop clapping and let it hit the floor then clearly you must hate freedom and/or be a communist.

Modes:

Marathon: Like a patriotic Desert Bus, clap until you can clap no more in this test of endurance.

Survival: Short and stupid, clap faster and faster, embarrassing yourself in the name of Old Glory.

Music: Hulk Hogan's theme - WWF Royal Rumble (SEGA Mega Drive)

UPDATE 2014-05-11:

  • Clap detection should now be much better at ignoring background noise and speech.
  • Flag fall speed in marathon mode lowered to reflect being more difficult to exploit with speech.

2014-05-22:

  • Added the old version to the download list, in case your microphone is an enemy of freedom.

2014-07-04:

  • In the true spirit of Independence Day, Americlap's source code gets it's freedom. Do whatever you like with this poorly coded mess.
